entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
